translations: 乞丐，叫花子；<英，非正式>家伙
使贫穷，使匮乏；难以相信，无法相容

sentences.sentence: He tossed a penny to the beggar.
A beggar came up to us and ask for money.
sentences.translation: 一个乞丐走过来向我们要钱。

sentences.sentence: The soldier said, "Mind thy manners, thou young beggar!"
sentences.translation: 士兵说：“注意你的举止，你这个小乞丐！”
